preQuizHtml:
Make it to the end of the quiz by answering all questions correctly.

Get two answers correct to advance to the next level.

In this quiz, the progress bar measures the OVERALL correct number of answers. If you get 4 correct, the quiz will end.

Also, the number of strikes similarly measures the OVERALL number of incorrect answers. If you get 3 wrong, the quiz will end.

questions.questionHtml: True or false? Moons revolve around planets.
Which planet is known as the "red planet"?

options.feedback: Correct! Mars is red due to iron rusting within its dust and dirt.
It's not Venus. Venus does have a reddish-brown surface, but not nearly as red as Mars'. Mars is red due to iron rusting within its dust and dirt.
Mercury is grey! Mars is red due to iron rusting within its dust and dirt.
Neptune is a bright blue. Mars is red due to iron rusting within its dust and dirt.
